TITLE: Real-World Relevance
DEF: Identifying connections between educational content and activities, and real-life challenges
TASK: The Real-World Relevance pattern connects learning content to real-life situations and applications. By presenting relatable examples, case studies, and practical applications, it aims to make the learning experience more meaningful and to increase learner engagement and retention. Challenges may arise when trying to identify relevant real-world examples or applications. Effective use involves incorporating real-world examples regularly, contextualizing abstract concepts, and potentially using AI to source or create relevant scenarios.
